The humor and satire in this image arise from the juxtaposition of expectations versus reality. On the left, the interior scene of the room with an open door provides a serene view of water, suggesting a picturesque and desirable beachfront apartment. This represents an idealized vision of living by the water.

However, on the right, the reality is revealed: a massive wave is forming outside, ready to engulf the building. This presents an ironic twist where the beauty of living by the sea is undercut by the looming danger of a natural disaster, highlighting the absurdity of desiring such views without considering inherent risks. The simplicity of the minimalist art style further enhances the wit, emphasizing the stark contrast between the ideal and the reality.
